text: U heke hun tirsiyan, ku we niveka wan (jin u meran) herdukan vebe (idi ewan li hev nayen) hun berewaneki ji maline merike u berewaneki ji ji maline jinike bisine (civine). Heke bi rasti ewan herdu berewanan biven, ku di niveka wan herdu (jinik u merike) asti bikin, Yezdane astiya wan herdukan pek bine. Bi rasti Yezdan zanaye agahdar e
